Author: jgtolentino
Message:
ci: harden migrations and fix GitHub Actions failures (#21)

* feat: Complete Scout Edge Ingest system with confidence scoring

- Supabase Edge Function for transaction ingestion
- Gold SQL schema with transactions and items tables
- Confidence calibration with Brier/ECE metrics
- Edge device configuration for Raspberry Pi
- Explainability traces for debugging
- Quality gates and validation
- Golden fixture for testing
- Complete deployment and integration guides

* docs: Add comprehensive API documentation and sample responses

- API response examples for all scenarios
- Dashboard SQL queries for all 4 main views
- Complete JSON schema reference with annotations
- Success and error response patterns
- Real-world query examples for analytics

* feat: Add TBWA gap analysis and complete fix package

- Sample request/response JSON files
- Compact schema for quick reference
- Brand backfill script (70+ PH brands)
- Quality monitoring views and metrics
- Transcript staging for conversation analytics
- Updated edge function with transcript capture
- Comprehensive gap analysis document
- Deployment checklist and success metrics

* feat: Complete brand resolution system with STT integration

- Brand Universe unifying all sources (STT, catalog, observed)
- 337+ variant mappings from STT dictionary
- Server-side resolver with fuzzy matching
- Automatic brand standardization on insert
- Token mining from conversation transcripts
- Comprehensive coverage views and reports
- Export functionality for edge devices
- Complete setup and maintenance guide

* feat: Complete quality monitoring and alerting system

- Confusion matrix infrastructure with KPI tracking
- Automated evaluation schedules (hourly/daily)
- Quality Sentinel edge function for ClickUp/GitHub integration
- Per-brand recall/precision/F1 metrics
- Store-level drift detection
- Operational alerts with deduplication
- GitHub Actions workflow for automated checks
- Comprehensive monitoring guide

* feat: Complete Scout ETL Pipeline with Medallion Architecture

- Bronze: EdgeDevice â†’ scout-edge-ingest â†’ scout_gold_transactions/items
- Silver: Brand resolution, quality calibration, confusion matrix tracking
- Gold: Curated views with KPIs, brand universe, operational monitoring

Key features:
- Real-time transaction ingestion with confidence scoring
- Brand resolution system with STT dictionary (337+ variants)
- Quality monitoring with confusion matrix evaluation
- Automated alerts via ClickUp/GitHub integration
- SKU scraping infrastructure with queue-based architecture
- Comprehensive operational dashboards

This addresses TBWA's critical findings:
- 99.67% brand data missing â†’ Multi-layered brand resolution
- No product structure â†’ SKU scraping and catalog integration
- No quality metrics â†’ Confusion matrix and F1 scoring
- No demographics â†’ Capture and validation infrastructure

Ready for deployment with full monitoring and alerting.

* feat: Production-grade hardening for SKU scraper

- Database optimizations:
  - Performance indexes on queue and cache tables
  - Exponential backoff for transient failures (429/503)
  - Poison queue quarantine after 6 attempts
  - TTL cleanup for old jobs (30 days)
  - Double-run prevention trigger

- Master catalog integration:
  - scout.master_items table for SKU storage
  - Automatic ingestion from edge function
  - Deduplication on (source, url, brand, product, pack)

- Operational controls:
  - Emergency stop with domain throttling
  - Source quarantine/release functions
  - Domain-specific rate limiting
  - Job inspection utilities

- Health monitoring:
  - Real-time dashboard snapshot
  - Detailed crawl metrics (queue, cache, items)
  - Content churn detection
  - Domain performance tracking

- Automation:
  - pg_cron schedules for recrawl and cleanup
  - Stuck job recovery every 6 hours
  - Worker improvements with proper backoff

- Developer experience:
  - Comprehensive Makefile targets
  - Operations guide with playbook
  - Bruno requests for all operations
  - Deployment script with health checks

This completes the production-ready SKU scraping infrastructure,
ready to feed Scout's master catalog with reliable, monitored data.

* feat: Complete multi-source ingestion system with edge computing

- File Ingestion System:
  - Gmail attachment auto-processing with pattern matching
  - Google Drive folder monitoring with configurable scanning
  - Manual upload API with batch support
  - Priority queue with retry logic
  - 5 default email triggers configured
  - Support for JSON, CSV, ZIP, SRT, VTT, Excel formats

- Edge Computing Infrastructure:
  - Raspberry Pi 5 device fleet management
  - STT (Speech-to-Text) event processing
  - OpenCV brand detection integration
  - Real-time transaction synthesis
  - 3 devices pre-configured for Manila stores
  - PH brand catalog (Lucky Me, Nescafe, San Miguel, etc.)

- Integration Features:
  - Unified analytics across all data sources
  - Edge-Scout schema bridge
  - Real-time pipeline monitoring
  - Store performance comparison
  - Confidence scoring and alerts
  - System-wide health dashboard

- API Endpoints:
  - api.ingest_from_gmail()
  - api.upload_file()
  - api.batch_ingest_files()
  - api.ingest_from_drive()
  - edge.ingest_edge_event()

- Monitoring & Operations:
  - Comprehensive dashboards
  - Performance metrics
  - Alert system for low confidence/offline devices
  - Operations guide with troubleshooting

This creates a production-ready multi-source data ingestion platform
combining email attachments, cloud storage, edge devices, and web scraping
into a unified analytics system for Scout.

* feat: Scout Analytics Dashboard with Supabase configuration fix

- Robust Supabase client configuration supporting multiple environments:
  - Vite (VITE_SUPABASE_URL/VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY)
  - Next.js (NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL/NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY)
  - Runtime window.__ENV__ for static hosting
  - Meta tags fallback
  - Hardcoded production values as ultimate fallback

- Complete React dashboard with TypeScript:
  - Real-time system health monitoring
  - Edge device status tracking
  - Pipeline metrics dashboard
  - File ingestion queue monitoring
  - Auto-refresh capabilities (5s-60s intervals)

- Data services layer:
  - fetchDashboardMetrics()
  - fetchEdgeDeviceStatus()
  - fetchSystemHealth()
  - fetchPipelineStatus()
  - fetchUnifiedAnalytics()

- Custom React hooks:
  - useScoutDashboard() - Combined data fetching
  - usePipelineStatus() - Real-time metrics
  - useEdgeDeviceStatus() - Device monitoring

- Deployment configurations:
  - Vite build setup with React
  - Tailwind CSS for styling
  - Runtime environment injection for Vercel
  - Environment variable examples

This fixes the 'supabaseUrl is required' error in the Vercel deployment
by providing multiple fallback mechanisms for configuration loading.

* docs: Add monorepo structure analysis and migration script

* chore: Update edge-suqi-pie submodule reference

* chore: remove submodule and add monorepo configs

* chore: scaffold monorepo structure (apps/, services/, db/, dq/, infra/, CI)

- Imported edge-suqi-pie as subtree at apps/pi-edge with full history
- Centralized SQL migrations in db/migrations/
- Organized views and checks in dq/ directory
- Added pnpm workspace and Turbo configuration
- Created baseline CI/CD with GitHub Actions
- Established CODEOWNERS for code review routing
- Added development Docker Compose configuration
